DOC.brief_summary: This blind cross-over study aim evaluate efficacy topical liposome-encapsulated ropivacaine formulation .
DOC.detailed_description: This blind cross-over study aim evaluate efficacy topical liposome-encapsulated 1 2 % ropivacaine gel formulation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers free cardiac , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , neurological , gastrointestinal haematological disease , psychiatric disorder allergy local anesthetic
